scripts.watch:parallel: parallelshell 'npm run browsersync' 'npm run watch:sass' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.watch:sass: watch --interval 0.1 'npm run sass && npm run postcss' assets/_sass
scripts.watch:js: watch --interval 0.1 'npm run eslint && npm run concat' assets/_js
scripts.dist: npm run mkdirp && parallelshell 'npm run dist:css' 'npm run dist:js' 'npm run imagemin'
scripts.dist:css: npm run sass && npm run dist:postcss
scripts.dist:js: npm run eslint && npm run concat && npm run uglify && rm assets/js/*.map
